info.title: Trello
info.description: Trello gives you perspective over all your projects, at work and at home.  It is an easy, free, flexible, and visual way to manage your projects and organize anything.  Connect to Trello to manage your boards, lists and cards.

get.summary: List the cards in a board
get.description: List the cards matching the query parameters in a specific board.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The unique id of the board.

parameters.name: actions
parameters.description: The list the actions to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to show attachments.

parameters.name: attachment_fields
parameters.description: List the attachment fields to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: stickers
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to show stickers.

parameters.name: members
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to show members.

parameters.name: memeber_fields
parameters.description: List the member fields to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: checkItemStates
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return the card states.

parameters.name: checklists
parameters.description: Specify the checklists to return.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The max number of results to return, between 1 and 1000.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Fetch all cards after this date.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Fetch all cards before this date.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: An option on how to filter the response. The allowed values are 'all', 'closed', 'none', 'open' or 'visible'.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List the card fields to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred

get.summary: A simple version of the list cards
get.description: A simple version of the list cards API method used by dynamic values.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Board Id.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred

get.summary: Get a card by id
get.description: Get a specific card by its unique id.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The id of the board to fetch cards in.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The id of the card to fetch.

parameters.name: actions
parameters.description: List the actions to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: actions_entities
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return action entities.

parameters.name: actions_display
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return action displays.

parameters.name: actions_limit
parameters.description: Max number of actions to return.

parameters.name: action_fields
parameters.description: List of action fields to return for each action. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: action_memberCreator_fields
parameters.description: List of action member creator fields to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return attachments.

parameters.name: attachment_fields
parameters.description: List of attachment fields to return for each attachment. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: members
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return members.

parameters.name: member_fields
parameters.description: List of member fields to return for each member. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: membersVoted
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return voted members.

parameters.name: memberVoted_fields
parameters.description: List of voted member fields to return for each voted member. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: checkItemStates
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return card states.

parameters.name: checkItemState_fields
parameters.description: List of state fields to return for each of the card item state. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: checklists
parameters.description: Specify the checklists to return for each card.

parameters.name: checklist_fields
parameters.description: List of checklist fields to return for each checklist. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: board
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return the board which the card belongs to.

parameters.name: board_fields
parameters.description: List the board fields to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: list
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return the list which the card belongs to.

parameters.name: list_fields
parameters.description: List the list fields to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: stickers
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return the stickers.

parameters.name: sticker_fields
parameters.description: List the sticker fields to return for each sticker. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List the card fields to return.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred

get.summary: List boards
get.description: List the boards matching the specified query parameters.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: List filters to apply to board results. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List the board fields to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: actions
parameters.description: List the action fields to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: actions_entities
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return action entities.

parameters.name: actions_limit
parameters.description: The max number of actions to return.

parameters.name: actions_format
parameters.description: Specify the format of the actions to return. The valid options are 'count', 'list', 'minimal'.

parameters.name: actions_since
parameters.description: Return actions after the specified date.

parameters.name: action_fields
parameters.description: List the fields of the action to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: memberships
parameters.description: Specify membership information to return.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return organization information.

parameters.name: organization_fields
parameters.description: List the organization fields to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: lists
parameters.description: Specify whether to return lists which belong to the board.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred

get.summary: A simple version of the list boards
get.description: A simple version of the list boards API call with no parameters to be used by dynamic values.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred

get.summary: Get a board by Id
get.description: Get a specific board by its unique identifier.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The unique Id of the board to get.

parameters.name: actions
parameters.description: List the actions to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: action_entities
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return action entities.

parameters.name: actions_display
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return actions display.

parameters.name: actions_format
parameters.description: Specify the format of the actions to return. Valid options are 'count', 'list', 'minimal'.

parameters.name: actions_since
parameters.description: Only return the actions after this date.

parameters.name: actions_limit
parameters.description: Max number of actions to return.

parameters.name: action_fields
parameters.description: List the fields to return with each field. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: action_member
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return action members.

parameters.name: action_member_fields
parameters.description: List the member fields to return with each action member. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: action_memberCreator
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return action member creator.

parameters.name: action_memberCreator_fields
parameters.description: List the action member creator fields to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: cards
parameters.description: Specify the cards to return. Valid options are 'all', 'closed', 'none', 'open', or 'visible'.

parameters.name: card_fields
parameters.description: List the fields to return for each card. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: card_attachments
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return attachments on cards.

parameters.name: card_attachment_fields
parameters.description: List the attachment fields to return for each attachment. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: card_checklists
parameters.description: Specify the checklists to return for each card.

parameters.name: card_stickers
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return card stickers.

parameters.name: boardStars
parameters.description: Specify the board stars to return.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: Specify the labels to return.

parameters.name: label_fields
parameters.description: List the label fields to return for each label. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: labels_limit
parameters.description: Max number of labels to return.

parameters.name: lists
parameters.description: Specify the lists to return.

parameters.name: list_fields
parameters.description: List the list fields to return for each list. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: memberships
parameters.description: List the memberships to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: memberships_member
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return membership members.

parameters.name: memberships_member_fields
parameters.description: List the member fields to return for each membership member. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: members
parameters.description: List the members to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: member_fields
parameters.description: List the member fields to return for each member. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: membersInvited
parameters.description: Specify the invited members to return.

parameters.name: membersInvited_fields
parameters.description: List the fields to return for each. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: checklists
parameters.description: Specify the checklists to return.

parameters.name: checklist_fields
parameters.description: List the checklist fields to return for each checklist. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return the organization information.

parameters.name: organization_fields
parameters.description: List the organization fields to return for each organization. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: organization_memberships
parameters.description: List the organization memberships to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

parameters.name: myPerfs
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to return my perfs.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List the fields to return. Specify 'all' or a comma seperated list of valid values.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the board to update.

parameters.name: board
parameters.description: The board features to update.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred

id.description: The unique id of the card.

checkItemStates.description: The check item states in the card.

closed.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the card is closed.

dateLastActivity.description: The datetime of last activity on the card.

idBoard.description: The unique Id of the board which the card belongs to.

idList.description: The unique Id of the list which the card belongs to.

idMembersVoted.description: The unique Ids of the voting members.

idShort.description: The short Id of the card.

idAttachmentCover.description: The unique Id of the attachment cover.

manualCoverAttachment.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the card has a manual cover attachment.

idLabels.description: A list of label Ids on the card.

shortLink.description: A short link to the card.

due.description: The due date of the card.

shortUrl.description: The short url link to the card.

subscribed.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the card is subscribed to.

url.description: The full url to the card.

id.description: The unique id of the card.

checkItemStates.description: The check item states in the card.

closed.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the card is closed.

dateLastActivity.description: The datetime of last activity on the card.

idBoard.description: The unique Id of the board which the card belongs to.

idList.description: The unique Id of the list which the card belongs to.

idMembersVoted.description: The unique Ids of the voting members.

idShort.description: The short Id of the card.

idAttachmentCover.description: The unique Id of the attachment cover.

manualCoverAttachment.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the card has a manual cover attachment.

subscribed.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the card is subscribed to.

url.description: The full url to the card.

id.description: The unique id of the card.

idShort.description: The short Id of the card.

shortLink.description: A short link to the card.

due.description: The due date of the card.

Votes.description: The number of votes on the card badges.

ViewingMemberVoted.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not viewing members voted on the badge.

Subscribed.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the account is subscribed to the card badges.

CheckItems.description: The number of check items in the badge.

CheckItemsChecked.description: The number of checked check items in the badge.

Due.description: The due date of the badge.

UpdateCard.description: Model for updating a card in Trello.

name.description: The updated name of the new card.

desc.description: The updated description of the new card.

closed.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the card is closed.

idAttachmentCover.description: The id of the attachment to attach to the card.

idBoard.description: The id of the board to attach the card to.

idList.description: The id of the list to attach the card to.

pos.description: The position of the card on the page. Specify top, bottom, or a positive number. Note this is used in relation to existing card locations so the resulting location may not match the exact value provided.

due.description: The due date of the card.

subscribed.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to subscribe to the card.

UpdateCard_V2.description: Model for updating a card in Trello.

name.description: The updated name of the new card.

desc.description: The updated description of the new card.

closed.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the card is closed.

idMembersArray.description: An array of member Ids to attach to the card.

idAttachmentCover.description: The id of the attachment to attach to the card.

idBoard.description: The id of the board to attach the card to.

idList.description: The id of the list to attach the card to.

pos.description: The position of the card on the page. Specify top, bottom, or a positive number. Note this is used in relation to existing card locations so the resulting location may not match the exact value provided.

due.description: The due date of the card.

subscribed.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to subscribe to the card.

CreateCard.description: Model for creating a new card in Trello.

idList.description: The id of the list that the card should be added to.

name.description: The name of the new card.

desc.description: The description of the new card.

pos.description: The position of the card. Specify top, bottom, or a positive number. Note this is used in relation to existing card locations so the resulting location may not match the exact value provided.

idMembers.description: A comma seperated list of member Ids to attach to the card.

idLabels.description: A comma-separated list of labels Ids to attach to the card.

urlSource.description: Source url of the card. Has to be a URL starting with http:// or https:// or null.

idCardSource.description: The Id of the card to copy into a new card.

keepFromSource.description: Properties of the card to copy over from the source.

due.description: The due date of the card.

CreateCard_V2.description: Model for creating a new card in Trello.

idList.description: The id of the list that the card should be added to.

name.description: The name of the new card.

desc.description: The description of the new card.

pos.description: The position of the card. Specify top, bottom, or a positive number. Note this is used in relation to existing card locations so the resulting location may not match the exact value provided.

idMembersArray.description: An array of member Ids to attach to the card.

idLabelsArray.description: An array of label Ids to attach to the card.

urlSource.description: Source url of the card. Has to be a URL starting with http:// or https:// or null.

idCardSource.description: The Id of the card to copy into a new card.

keepFromSource.description: Properties of the card to copy over from the source.

due.description: The due date of the card.

id.description: The unique Id of the board.

closed.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the board is closed.

dateLastActivity.description: Date of the last activity on the board.

dateLastView.description: Date of the last time the board is viewed.

invitations.description: The list of invitations on the board.

invited.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the account is invited to the board.

pinned.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the board is pinned.

powerUps.description: The set of power ups on the board.

shortLink.description: The short link of the board.

shortUrl.description: The short url to the board.

starred.description: A value determining whether or not the board is starred.

subscribed.description: A value determining whether or not the account is subscribed to the board.

url.description: The full url of the board.

id.description: The unique Id of the board.

dateLastActivity.description: Date of the last activity on the board.

dateLastView.description: Date of the last time the board is viewed.

pinned.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the board is pinned.

powerUps.description: The set of power ups on the board.

shortLink.description: The short link of the board.

shortUrl.description: The short url to the board.

starred.description: A value determining whether or not the board is starred.

url.description: The full url of the board.

green.description: The value of the green label.

yellow.description: The value of the yellow label.

orange.description: The value of the orange label.

red.description: The value of the red label.

purple.description: The value of the purple label.

blue.description: The value of the blue label.

sky.description: The value of the sky blue label.

lime.description: The value of the lime green label.

pink.description: The value of the pink label.

black.description: The value of the black label.

id.description: The unique Id of the membership.

idMember.description: The unique Id of the member.

unconfirmed.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the membership is unconfirmed.

permissionLevel.description: The permission level of the object.

voting.description: Who can vote on the object.

comments.description: Who can comment on the object.

invitations.description: Who can invite people to the object.

selfJoin.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the object can self join.

cardCovers.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the object has access to card covers.

calendarFeedEnabled.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the calendar feed enabled.

backgroundColor.description: The background color of the object, in hex notation.

backgroundImage.description: The background image of the object.

backgroundImageScaled.description: The scaled version of the background image.

backgroundTile.description: The background tile of the object.

backgroundBrightness.description: The brightness of the object background.

canBePublic.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the object can be public.

canBeOrg.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the object can be part of the organization

canBePrivate.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the object can be private.

canInvite.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the object can have invititations.

UpdateBoard.description: A Trello Board Object used to create a board

defaultLists.description: A string (true, false) determining whether or not to create default lists.

prefs_permissionLevel.description: The permission level of the board.

prefs_comments.description: The comment preferences on the board. Valid options are 'disabled', 'members', 'observers', 'org' or 'public'.

prefs_invitations.description: The invitation preferences of the board. Valid options are 'admins' or 'members'.

prefs_cardCovers.description: A string (true, false) determining whether or not to use card covers.

prefs_background.description: The background color of the board.

prefs_voting.description: The voting power-up preferences of the board.

prefs_cardAging.description: The card aging power-up preferences of the board.

enable_calendar.description: A string (true, false) determining whether or not to enable calendar power-up

id.description: The unique Id of the list.

closed.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the list is closed.

idBoard.description: The unique Id of the board which the list belongs to.

subscribed.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not to the account is subscribed to the list.

id.description: The unique Id of the list.

idBoard.description: The unique Id of the board the list belongs to.

id.description: The unique ID of the team.

displayName.description: The display name of the team.

idBoards.description: The boards assigned to this team.

billableMemberCount.description: The number of members in this team.

permissionLevel.description: The permission level of the team.

id.description: The unique Id of the member.

fullName.description: The full name of the member.

id.description: The unique Id of the webhook.

idModel.description: ID of the model to be monitored (i.e. card,board, etc.)

callbackURL.description: The callbackURL to receive webhook notifications

active.description: Determines whether the webhook is active and sending POST requests.

consecutiveFailures.description: The number of consecutive Failures in posting webhook notifications.

firstConsecutiveFailDate.description: The date of First Consecutive Failure.

Comment.description: The model for getting a comment

date.description: The datetime the comment was left.

CommentPost.description: The model for posting a comment

defaultLists.description: A string (true, false) determining whether or not to create default lists.

prefs_comments.description: The comment preferences of the board.

prefs_invitations.description: The invitation preferences of the board.

prefs_cardCovers.description: A string (true, false) determining whether or not to use card covers.

prefs_cardAging.description: The card aging power-up preferences of the board.

enable_calendar.description: A string (true, false) determining whether or not to enable calendar power-up.

idBoard.description: The unique Id of the board to create the list in.

pos.description: The position of the list. Specify top, bottom, or a positive number.

idListSource.description: The id of the list to copy into the new list.

due.description: The due date of the checkitem.

idChecklist.description: The unique Id of the checklist.

ClientSubscription.description: Describes the subscription information for webhook.
